name: The Graveyard Shift (okura, Mellie)
description:
During the day, the graveyard is a quiet place for mourning and resting, but during the night, the souls of the damned come back to life to wreak havoc, and it's your job to keep them at bay. Good luck!

Play as a little orange-haired fella, as they spend their nights fighting for their life against challenging waves of the undead.

  • All menus are navigated via arrow keys or gamepad buttons to emulate an arcade cabinet
  • This game supports both keyboard and controller inputs.

Credit:

Tutorial Music by: Kevin MacLeod

Nighttime and Title screen music by : Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Daytime Ambience by: Klankbeeld

Alkhemikal Font by: Jeti

Freesound.org

Kenney.nl

This game was made for the 2 week long GXC Notice-Me GameJam! 

If you enjoyed it please consider supporting it on GXC:
